00002 static const char* gridBroadphaseCL= \
00003 "int getPosHash(int4 gridPos, __global float4* pParams)\n"
00004 "{\n"
00005 "       int4 gridDim = *((__global int4*)(pParams + 1));\n"
00006 "       gridPos.x &= gridDim.x - 1;\n"
00007 "       gridPos.y &= gridDim.y - 1;\n"
00008 "       gridPos.z &= gridDim.z - 1;\n"
00009 "       int hash = gridPos.z * gridDim.y * gridDim.x + gridPos.y * gridDim.x + gridPos.x;\n"
00010 "       return hash;\n"
00011 "} \n"
00012 "int4 getGridPos(float4 worldPos, __global float4* pParams)\n"
00013 "{\n"
00014 "    int4 gridPos;\n"
00015 "       int4 gridDim = *((__global int4*)(pParams + 1));\n"
00016 "    gridPos.x = (int)floor(worldPos.x * pParams[0].x) & (gridDim.x - 1);\n"
00017 "    gridPos.y = (int)floor(worldPos.y * pParams[0].y) & (gridDim.y - 1);\n"
00018 "    gridPos.z = (int)floor(worldPos.z * pParams[0].z) & (gridDim.z - 1);\n"
00019 "    return gridPos;\n"
00020 "}\n"
00021 "// calculate grid hash value for each body using its AABB\n"
00022 "__kernel void kCalcHashAABB(int numObjects, __global float4* allpAABB, __global const int* smallAabbMapping, __global int2* pHash, __global float4* pParams )\n"
00023 "{\n"
00024 "    int index = get_global_id(0);\n"
00025 "    if(index >= numObjects)\n"
00026 "       {\n"
00027 "               return;\n"
00028 "       }\n"
00029 "       float4 bbMin = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[index]*2];\n"
00030 "       float4 bbMax = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[index]*2 + 1];\n"
00031 "       float4 pos;\n"
00032 "       pos.x = (bbMin.x + bbMax.x) * 0.5f;\n"
00033 "       pos.y = (bbMin.y + bbMax.y) * 0.5f;\n"
00034 "       pos.z = (bbMin.z + bbMax.z) * 0.5f;\n"
00035 "       pos.w = 0.f;\n"
00036 "    // get address in grid\n"
00037 "    int4 gridPos = getGridPos(pos, pParams);\n"
00038 "    int gridHash = getPosHash(gridPos, pParams);\n"
00039 "    // store grid hash and body index\n"
00040 "    int2 hashVal;\n"
00041 "    hashVal.x = gridHash;\n"
00042 "    hashVal.y = index;\n"
00043 "    pHash[index] = hashVal;\n"
00044 "}\n"
00045 "__kernel void kClearCellStart( int numCells, \n"
00046 "                                                               __global int* pCellStart )\n"
00047 "{\n"
00048 "    int index = get_global_id(0);\n"
00049 "    if(index >= numCells)\n"
00050 "       {\n"
00051 "               return;\n"
00052 "       }\n"
00053 "       pCellStart[index] = -1;\n"
00054 "}\n"
00055 "__kernel void kFindCellStart(int numObjects, __global int2* pHash, __global int* cellStart )\n"
00056 "{\n"
00057 "       __local int sharedHash[513];\n"
00058 "    int index = get_global_id(0);\n"
00059 "       int2 sortedData;\n"
00060 "    if(index < numObjects)\n"
00061 "       {\n"
00062 "               sortedData = pHash[index];\n"
00063 "               // Load hash data into shared memory so that we can look \n"
00064 "               // at neighboring body's hash value without loading\n"
00065 "               // two hash values per thread\n"
00066 "               sharedHash[get_local_id(0) + 1] = sortedData.x;\n"
00067 "               if((index > 0) && (get_local_id(0) == 0))\n"
00068 "               {\n"
00069 "                       // first thread in block must load neighbor body hash\n"
00070 "                       sharedHash[0] = pHash[index-1].x;\n"
00071 "               }\n"
00072 "       }\n"
00073 "    barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00074 "    if(index < numObjects)\n"
00075 "       {\n"
00076 "               if((index == 0) || (sortedData.x != sharedHash[get_local_id(0)]))\n"
00077 "               {\n"
00078 "                       cellStart[sortedData.x] = index;\n"
00079 "               }\n"
00080 "       }\n"
00081 "}\n"
00082 "int testAABBOverlap(float4 min0, float4 max0, float4 min1, float4 max1)\n"
00083 "{\n"
00084 "       return  (min0.x <= max1.x)&& (min1.x <= max0.x) && \n"
00085 "                       (min0.y <= max1.y)&& (min1.y <= max0.y) && \n"
00086 "                       (min0.z <= max1.z)&& (min1.z <= max0.z); \n"
00087 "}\n"
00088 "//search for AABB 'index' against other AABBs' in this cell\n"
00089 "void findPairsInCell(  int numObjects,\n"
00090 "                                               int4    gridPos,\n"
00091 "                                               int    index,\n"
00092 "                                               __global int2*  pHash,\n"
00093 "                                               __global int*   pCellStart,\n"
00094 "                                               __global float4* allpAABB, \n"
00095 "                                               __global const int* smallAabbMapping,\n"
00096 "                                               __global float4* pParams,\n"
00097 "                                                       volatile  __global int* pairCount,\n"
00098 "                                               __global int4*   pPairBuff2,\n"
00099 "                                               int maxPairs\n"
00100 "                                               )\n"
00101 "{\n"
00102 "       int4 pGridDim = *((__global int4*)(pParams + 1));\n"
00103 "       int maxBodiesPerCell = pGridDim.w;\n"
00104 "    int gridHash = getPosHash(gridPos, pParams);\n"
00105 "    // get start of bucket for this cell\n"
00106 "    int bucketStart = pCellStart[gridHash];\n"
00107 "    if (bucketStart == -1)\n"
00108 "       {\n"
00109 "        return;   // cell empty\n"
00110 "       }\n"
00111 "       // iterate over bodies in this cell\n"
00112 "    int2 sortedData = pHash[index];\n"
00113 "       int unsorted_indx = sortedData.y;\n"
00114 "    float4 min0 = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[unsorted_indx]*2 + 0]; \n"
00115 "       float4 max0 = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[unsorted_indx]*2 + 1];\n"
00116 "       int handleIndex =  as_int(min0.w);\n"
00117 "       \n"
00118 "       int bucketEnd = bucketStart + maxBodiesPerCell;\n"
00119 "       bucketEnd = (bucketEnd > numObjects) ? numObjects : bucketEnd;\n"
00120 "       for(int index2 = bucketStart; index2 < bucketEnd; index2++) \n"
00121 "       {\n"
00122 "        int2 cellData = pHash[index2];\n"
00123 "        if (cellData.x != gridHash)\n"
00124 "        {\n"
00125 "                       break;   // no longer in same bucket\n"
00126 "               }\n"
00127 "               int unsorted_indx2 = cellData.y;\n"
00128 "        //if (unsorted_indx2 < unsorted_indx) // check not colliding with self\n"
00129 "               if (unsorted_indx2 != unsorted_indx) // check not colliding with self\n"
00130 "        {   \n"
00131 "                       float4 min1 = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[unsorted_indx2]*2 + 0];\n"
00132 "                       float4 max1 = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[unsorted_indx2]*2 + 1];\n"
00133 "                       if(testAABBOverlap(min0, max0, min1, max1))\n"
00134 "                       {\n"
00135 "                               if (pairCount)\n"
00136 "                               {\n"
00137 "                                       int handleIndex2 = as_int(min1.w);\n"
00138 "                                       if (handleIndex<handleIndex2)\n"
00139 "                                       {\n"
00140 "                                               int curPair = atomic_add(pairCount,1);\n"
00141 "                                               if (curPair<maxPairs)\n"
00142 "                                               {\n"
00143 "                                                       int4 newpair;\n"
00144 "                                                       newpair.x = handleIndex;\n"
00145 "                                                       newpair.y = handleIndex2;\n"
00146 "                                                       newpair.z = -1;\n"
00147 "                                                       newpair.w = -1;\n"
00148 "                                                       pPairBuff2[curPair] = newpair;\n"
00149 "                                               }\n"
00150 "                                       }\n"
00151 "                               \n"
00152 "                               }\n"
00153 "                       }\n"
00154 "               }\n"
00155 "       }\n"
00156 "}\n"
00157 "__kernel void kFindOverlappingPairs(   int numObjects,\n"
00158 "                                                                               __global float4* allpAABB, \n"
00159 "                                                                               __global const int* smallAabbMapping,\n"
00160 "                                                                               __global int2* pHash, \n"
00161 "                                                                               __global int* pCellStart, \n"
00162 "                                                                               __global float4* pParams ,\n"
00163 "                                                                               volatile  __global int* pairCount,\n"
00164 "                                                                               __global int4*   pPairBuff2,\n"
00165 "                                                                               int maxPairs\n"
00166 "                                                                               )\n"
00167 "{\n"
00168 "    int index = get_global_id(0);\n"
00169 "    if(index >= numObjects)\n"
00170 "       {\n"
00171 "               return;\n"
00172 "       }\n"
00173 "    int2 sortedData = pHash[index];\n"
00174 "       int unsorted_indx = sortedData.y;\n"
00175 "       float4 bbMin = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[unsorted_indx]*2 + 0];\n"
00176 "       float4 bbMax = allpAABB[smallAabbMapping[unsorted_indx]*2 + 1];\n"
00177 "       float4 pos;\n"
00178 "       pos.x = (bbMin.x + bbMax.x) * 0.5f;\n"
00179 "       pos.y = (bbMin.y + bbMax.y) * 0.5f;\n"
00180 "       pos.z = (bbMin.z + bbMax.z) * 0.5f;\n"
00181 "    // get address in grid\n"
00182 "    int4 gridPosA = getGridPos(pos, pParams);\n"
00183 "    int4 gridPosB; \n"
00184 "    // examine only neighbouring cells\n"
00185 "    for(int z=-1; z<=1; z++) \n"
00186 "    {\n"
00187 "               gridPosB.z = gridPosA.z + z;\n"
00188 "        for(int y=-1; y<=1; y++) \n"
00189 "        {\n"
00190 "                       gridPosB.y = gridPosA.y + y;\n"
00191 "            for(int x=-1; x<=1; x++) \n"
00192 "            {\n"
00193 "                               gridPosB.x = gridPosA.x + x;\n"
00194 "                findPairsInCell(numObjects, gridPosB, index, pHash, pCellStart, allpAABB,smallAabbMapping, pParams, pairCount,pPairBuff2, maxPairs);\n"
00195 "            }\n"
00196 "        }\n"
00197 "    }\n"
00198 "}\n"
